hadiths.text: Shurahbil bin Muslim Al-Khawlani narrated from Abu Umamah Al-Bahili that the heard :the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say in his sermon, during the year of the Farewell pilgrimage: “Allah (SWT) has given each person who has rights his rights, and there is no bequest for in heir.”

chapter.eng-name: There Is No Bequest For An Heir
